meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: You need to apply <vocabulary>oil</vocabulary> to <reading>a bra</reading> (あぶら) because it's stuck on you. You can't get it unhooked, so you have to slide it off. Problem is, it's too tight, which is why <reading>a bra</reading> needs oil to slide off.
